features: 【Cooling Honeycomb Structure】The seat cushion is made of high elastic TPE gel thermostatic material, which makes it cool to sit on and helps people who are in long sitting to deal with the steam heat. With honeycomb structure, it can make the air flow, ventilation, even if sitting for a long time will not be stuffy.

【Super Soft, Hard to Deform】 Soft and elastic gel material, double design, excellent flexibility, can be squeezed back to the original shape immediately after stretching, it will always maintain its original shape and it won't lose its support, even after a long term use.

【Assists In Back Pain Relief】 Ergonomically designed seat cushion provides maximum support and comfort while reducing pressure on the coccyx / tailbone and promotes healthy posture. Supports recovery from lower back problems, helps with most sitting pain due to sciatica, herniated discs, tailbone injuries, pregnancy, hip pain and hemorrhoids.

【With Non-slip Washable Cover】The removable cover has a non-slip PVC base to prevent the cushion from sliding on any type of surface. Conveniently washable, the mesh cover is also breathable to prevent heat buildup, also keeps the cushion clean.

【Widely Application】 Great for: Office Chair, Computer Desk, Kitchen, Dining Room, Living Room, Patio, Couch, Recliner, Car, Truck, Train & Airplane Travel, Classrooms. Take it with you to Sporting Events to use on Benches. Also can be used as Pet Cushions.
body.description: Our gel seat cushion is specially designed for people who have been sitting for a long time. Its soft material and double-layer honeycomb design provide super comfort and breathability. The gel seat cushion is suitable for any place such as home/office seats, truck seats, and can provide services for the general population. The customer is most concerned: 1. A lot of people feedback that cushions are so hard, not soft enough, but the seat cushion need to give us enough support to relieve the pressure on the ischial bone, so its not very soft, suitable for most people, and its not that the softer the better 2. Products allow 1~2 cm manual measurement error, a lot of people said not as description, I understand the feelings of customers, but this 1~2 cm error does not affect the use of the product. 3. Many people said its so small, so please refer to the size carefully, you can measure it with a ruler before buying, so that you can better confirm whether it meets your needs. Finally we always try our best to let customers get the best experience and give customers the most authentic experience. We don't want to exaggerate the products, just hope that customers can understand, we are the professional sellers that sell gel seat cushion, you can trust us without hesitation. Product Specification: Item Name: Gel Seat Cushion Material: Premium Gel Color: Blue Size: about 16.5*14.5*1.6inch Weight: about 1100g/2.4LB Package Include: 1* Seat Cushion; 1* Non-slip Cover

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All day comfort
reviews.reviewText: Good value for the money. It really helps when I drive a lot!! I bought one that was to thick and was uncomfortable. This size is much better for my car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We use these on our charter boat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cushion ever
reviews.reviewText: This is actually the second one I have purchased. The first is still working as well as the day I started using it years ago. It maintains it's shape and hasn't given in to the usual constant pressure points. It provides the extra comfort needed even after hours of being in one position. I use the largest size in my medical lift chair and the smaller one on the arm rest side I mostly use. Never holds heat and truly conforms to give you the comfort you need. Durable and dependable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband said he noticed zero difference when using it. Might be to thin. Sent back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like how this feels…Wished I read the measurements first too small for me 🫣 but great quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is comfortable to sit on but very difficult to keep on the chair! When you stand up it slides off the chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the extra large so that it works hopefully cover the whole chair seat (a standard office chair). It does not which makes it uncomfortable and you always feel like your on the edge. This support is better than the last one I ordered but given the size I still don’t recommend it.
